my favorite genre of music is rock.

I am a female in my early 20s.

content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
Not too bad, what about yours?
I'm doing great! I recently had knee surgery so I'm enjoying some down time at home.
Oh no, I hope you have a speedy recovery! I love to hike and spend time outdoors, so I'm pretty active.
Thank you! I'm doing my best to stay active. I like to hike and play pretend with my daughter.
That's so cute, I bet your daughter loves that. I wish I made more money so I could afford to travel more.
I know what you mean, I'm always looking for ways to save money. My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
That's awesome! I'm trying to eat healthier, but it can be tough to find the time to cook.
I know what you mean, I'm trying to cook at home more often too. I love rock music, what do you like to listen to?
I love all types of music, but I'm a huge fan of rock and roll.
Me too! I'm a big fan of Rita Hayworth, she's my idol.
I've never heard of her, I'll have to look her up
